column1: The '''Field of Celebrant''' lay between the Rivers [[Anduin]] and [[Limlight]]
In {{TA|2510}}<ref>{{App|TA}}</ref> this was the site of the decisive [[Battle of the Field of Celebrant]]
column2: at which [[Eorl]] the Young rode from the north to the aid of [[Gondor]].<ref>{{UT|Cirion}}</ref>
